title: Five Plead Guilty Over $7.9M Dark Web Crypto Drug Operation
contentSnippet: FireBunnyUSA operated for three years, shipping over 10,000 packages of illicit drugs while using crypto to obscure millions in proceeds.

title: Can the biggest Bitcoin whales really decide when the market turns green or red?
contentSnippet: Whales still move prices, but ETF flows, exchange liquidity, and macro shifts now decide Bitcoin’s daily color.

title: Thai regulators raid World iris scanning site in latest headache for Sam Altman
contentSnippet: Thailand’s SEC raids World’s iris scanning site over unlicensed WLD token operations, raising legal concerns for Sam Altman’s digital identity project.

title: Crypto treasuries siphon $800B from altcoins, and it might be ‘forever’
contentSnippet: Corporate crypto treasuries have attracted about $800 billion from retail investors, mainly at the expense of altcoins, according to 10x Research.

title: JPMorgan to Let Clients Use Bitcoin and Ether as Collateral for Loans: Report
contentSnippet: The bank’s new framework could let institutional clients post crypto as loan collateral under a third-party custody model.

title: Inflation Report Eyed; Multicoin Proposes Attention Perps: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 24, 2025

title: 83 Arrests in ‘Landmark’ Interpol Operation Hitting Crypto Terrorist Financing, Cybercrime in Africa
contentSnippet: $260 million in fiat and crypto was flagged as part of Operation Catalyst, of which some $600,000 has been seized to date.

title: JPMorgan to Allow Clients to Pledge Bitcoin and Ether as Collateral: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: The tokens pledged under the global program will be safeguarded by a third-party custodian.

title: Dogecoin price chart projects 25% gains, but first, this must happen
contentSnippet: Dogecoin must break above the $0.20 resistance level to signal a reduction in selling pressure, potentially sending the DOGE price beyond $0.25.

title: USD.AI Bridges DeFi and AI by Turning Stablecoins Into Loans for Nvidia GPUs
contentSnippet: Through a system that tokenizes hardware, USDai channels crypto liquidity into AI infrastructure while tapping in to demand for crypto credit

title: How an anonymous trader made $192M shorting one of the biggest crypto crashes
contentSnippet: A single anonymous trader saw the crash coming and capitalized on it, earning $192 million in just a few hours.

title: ‘There were NO money-laundering’ charges, CZ claps back at Senator Warren
contentSnippet: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao said Elizabeth Warren “can’t get her facts right” after she claimed he pled guilty to a money-laundering charge.

title: 米金融最大手JPモルガン、ビットコイン・イーサリアム担保融資を世界展開へ
contentSnippet: JPモルガンがビットコイン・イーサリアム担保融資を2025年末開始することがわかった。米金融最大手の参入で暗号資産（仮想通貨）が機関投資家市場で本格化。モルガン・スタンレーなど大手金融も相次ぎサービス拡充している。

title: How high can HYPE’s price go after Robinhood listing?
contentSnippet: HYPE has entered a classic breakout stage after its Robinhood listing, now eyeing a 40% price rally by November.

title: Crypto spot trading on CEXs recovers by 31% in Q3 after sharp drop
contentSnippet: After steep declines in Q1 and Q2, crypto spot trading on CEXs rebounded significantly, with volumes approaching those of late 2024.

title: Binance founder CZ’s presidential pardon is not an acquittal
contentSnippet: A presidential pardon spares CZ from punishment but not guilt — cementing his conviction, blocking appeal options, and exposing Binance to civil lawsuits.

title: Dormant Bitcoin Whale With $442M Awakens for First Time in 14 Years Amid Quantum Fears
contentSnippet: 14-year-old wallet moves $16.6M in BTC as analyst weigh security concerns and shifting on-chain behavior.

title: Fetch.ai, Ocean Protocol agree on return of $120M in FET tokens to avoid legal battle
contentSnippet: The FET token’s price fell by over 93% since the merger of the Artificial Superintelligence Alliance, a drop that is unrelated to Ocean Protocol’s actions, according to its founder.

title: AI Miners Surge Pre-Market on Record $38B Oracle Data Center Deal Boosts Sector
contentSnippet: A massive Oracle-led AI infrastructure financing ignites a sharp rally in AI and HPC mining stocks.

title: モブキャストHD、仮想通貨ソラナ（SOL）の取得・保有を開始
contentSnippet: ソラナ特化のトレジャリー戦略で財務基盤強化へモブキャストホールディングスは10月24日、暗号資産ソラナ（SOL）の取得および保有を開始したと発表した。同社はかつてゲーム事業に特化していたが、2018年4月に会社分割を実施し、主力のゲーム事業...

title: 日本初の円建てステーブルコインJPYC、正式リリースへ
contentSnippet: JPYC株式会社が10月27日午後1時、日本初の円建てステーブルコインJPYCを正式リリース。発行・償還・送金手数料は無料。第二種資金移動業者として第1号の認可取得。

title: Bitcoin, European Stocks Buoyant as Trump-Xi Meeting Confirmed
contentSnippet: The impending meeting comes amid escalating trade tensions, with President Trump threatening to impose additional tariffs on China

title: 米トランプ政権、量子コンピュータ企業へ株式取得型支援検討か　関連銘柄が急騰＝WSJ報道
contentSnippet: トランプ政権が量子コンピュータ企業への出資型支援を検討していると報道され、政府と協議中とされるIonQ、Rigetti、D-Waveなどの関連銘柄は最大20%上昇した。

title: On-Chain Crypto Perps Smash Records with $1T Trading Volume
contentSnippet: On-chain perpetual-focused decentralized exchanges have surpassed $1 trillion in total trading volume this month.

title: Bitcoin’s Rally Cools as Traders Hedge the Heat
contentSnippet: After months of steady gains, BTC is slipping below key cost-basis levels as long-term holders sell into strength and traders retreat to defensive derivatives.

title: Swiss Bank Sygnum to Launch Bitcoin-Backed Loan Platform With Multi-Sig Wallet Control
contentSnippet: The offering, developed with non-custodial BTC lending startup Debifi, targets institutions and high-net worth borrowers who don't want to give up control of their assets.

title: How Much Could Bitcoin, Ether, XRP and Solana Move After the U.S. Inflation Report?
contentSnippet: The release of September's Consumer Price Index (CPI) is expected to show a 3.1% rise in the cost of living from a year earlier, the highest in 18 months, according to FactSet.

title: Rep. Maxine Waters Blasts Trump Pardon of Binance Founder
contentSnippet: Trump’s pardon of Binance founder Changpeng Zhao has ignited political outrage and renewed scrutiny of his ties to the crypto industry.

title: イーサリアム『フサカ』12月3日実装へ、次期『グラムステルダム』準備も
contentSnippet: イーサリアム開発者は第223回ACDE会議で、フサカアップグレードの12月3日実装と、次期グラムステルダムの提案締切（10月30日）を決定。BAL技術導入やEIP 8058の追加など、スケーラビリティ強化に向けた計画が明らかに。

title: Bitcoin's Large Bag Holders Remain Net Buyers as Leverage Unwinds
contentSnippet: Some see possibility for a renewed bullish setup for Bitcoin as key holders continue accumulating following the market's historic wipeout.

title: 中東・北アフリカの仮想通貨市場が成長　トルコでアルトコイン投機が活発化＝チェイナリシス
contentSnippet: チェイナリシスが2025年時点での中東・北アフリカ地域の仮想通貨市場を分析した。トルコ、イスラエル、イラン、UAEでの成長をそれぞれ解説している。

title: ビットコイン11万ドル台を回復、トランプ大統領のCZ恩赦でBNBとWLFIが上昇
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）ビットコインは11万ドル台で軟調推移。オプション建玉増加やETF流出が重荷も、需給整理進み反発期待の声。トランプ大統領によるバイナンス創設者CZ恩赦を受け、BNBは5%高、WLFIは15%急騰した。

title: カルシとレッドストーン提携　予測市場データを110超のチェーンで展開
contentSnippet: DeFiレッドストーンとカルシが提携し、CFTC規制下の予測市場データを110以上のブロックチェーンで提供開始。オラクル技術により実世界イベントデータのオンチェーン化を実現、DeFi開発者に新たな構築基盤を提供。

title: Woman Repeatedly Warned by Canadian Exchange Not to Transfer Crypto, Gets Scammed Anyway
contentSnippet: Despite repeated warnings from crypto exchange NDAX Canada, the customer lost her life savings in Ethereum to a scam.

title: 資産運用大手ティー・ロウ・プライスが仮想通貨ETF市場に参入へ　BTCなど複数銘柄へ投資
contentSnippet: 資産運用大手ティー・ロウ・プライスは、仮想通貨ETFの申請書を米SECに提出。投資対象にはビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど時価総額が高い銘柄が含まれる。

title: BTCマイニング株、ビットコイン価格と連動せずAI事業シフトで上昇＝JPモルガンレポート
contentSnippet: JPモルガンの最新レポートによると、上場ビットコインマイニング企業の株価は仮想通貨価格との相関関係が崩れ、AI事業への転換により独自の動きを見せている。

title: RAND Warns of AI-Driven Cyber Chaos in New ‘Robot Insurgency’ Report
contentSnippet: RAND Corporation's simulation has shed light on how a rogue AI could cripple U.S. infrastructure before humans could react.

title: Wallets Tied to Melania Trump Meme Coin Airdropped $1.2 Million in Meteora Tokens
contentSnippet: Meteora’s co-founder resigned from his leadership role due to his part in the MELANIA launch. Now wallets linked to it just received an airdrop of $1.2 million in MET.

title: BNB, World Liberty, Meme Coins Jump After Trump Pardons Binance Founder
contentSnippet: Coins and tokens linked to crypto mogul Changpeng Zhao and President Trump jumped in price following news of the latest pardon.

title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Atlas Browser Has a Big Problem—How Crypto Users Can Protect Themselves
contentSnippet: OpenAI's AI web browser faces prompt injection attacks that security experts call an unsolved problem—but there are some things you can do to be safe.
